channel.title: Help me please
channel.description:
well i did everything single thing perfectly I had no probelms running my server and my source was (deltascape) i edited the run.bat and compile.bat to suit me but the compile bat said somehting like this client.java:450: ';' expected server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2741, 2381, 5106, heightLevel) ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . . The runbat said Deltascape server connection from 127.0.0.1:51764 werew: character file not found the it spammed null null null null
So i ignored it ran the bat and opened up my client(Moparscape) but when i tryied any random username it just logged in showed a black screen and said connection l0st logged me out and at the bottom it said Couldn't open output stream to log file werew-20101101.log what can i do to fix it to let me log in

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

we figured it out, don’t flame.

Read full topic

i downloaded the client v16 but when i runserver it just says like a bunch of stuff but it closes out instantly before i can make it out what do i putin the runserver.bat
but why does it keep spamming null null null whnever i run the source[/quote]
You were just suppose to download the client.

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @911_u_died 911 u died
item.description:
@911_u_died wrote:

ok i fixed it it was because the first one did not have a ; but the others did. the compiler works and run bat works but whever i try to log in to my server thruough moparscape it says couldnt open output stream to log file and i cant log in without it saying connectoin lost and i lag out and when i try to log back in it says im already logged in

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

no, that is regular
EDIT: I figured it out, that is just anti-leech from whoever amde that source, try this code, but if it doesnt work i suggest finding a new one, or research on how to get the anti-leech off. search for if(TzWave == 20) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2741, 2381, 5106, heightLevel) server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2406, 5071, heightLevel); server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2383, 5069, heightLevel); NeededKills = 69; } in client.java and replace with:

if(TzWave == 20) { server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2741, 2381, 5106, heightLevel) server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2630, 2406, 5071, heightLevel) server.npcHandler.spawnANPC(2627, 2383, 5069, heightLevel) NeededKills = 69; }

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

ok, i THINK that your server cant find the folder to put your account file into, and ill google your compile error, but, is your source delta or pi?

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @911_u_died 911 u died
item.description:
@911_u_died wrote:

ok there was already a folder named characters in the same place as the run.bat and there are no ; or anyhting in the 4th colomn besdies 0 1 and 2 and its confusing because the last source i used was perfect but it was a horrible server.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

it may have already been there? jsut check your autospawn.cfg for semicolons “;” and remove them. if there are no semicolons, then look in the 4th column ( allshould be 0,1,or 2s ) and change any that arent 0,1, or 2 to 0. for run.bat add a folder named “characters” in the same folder as your run.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Help me please
item.dc:creator: @rangadanger7 rangadanger7
item.description:
@rangadanger7 wrote:

did this error occur when u were adding / removing NPCs from your server? if so then on your next comment, click the # icon above your text, and copy/paste your autospawn.cfg file.
EDIT: Explanation - your error has to do with spawning an npc, so autospawn would be the first place to look if it were me.

Read full topic
